description:
After finding the body of Harawaki at the shooting location of a zombie movie, Kyoko is found dead next. On her smart phone is a video in which a zombified Harawaki bites Kyoko on the neck, and Harawaki`s body has disappeared from the other room. Conan and Heiji believe this case and the one from eight years ago may be related. Later, Gunma Police Inspector Yamamura begins his own investigation. With the help of eight year old photos and Kazuha`s comments, Conan and Heiji close in on the truth. Finally, they discover the trick behind the wardrobe and the identity of the killer...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La villa encerclée par les zombies (3e partie)
ゾンビが囲む別荘 (後編)
